overview: Amos Arev joined Commtouch in 2011 as Vice President of Research & Development. Mr. Arev has over 20 years of software development management experience and has spent over half of his career specializing in IT security. Prior to joining Commtouch, Mr. Arev was VP R&D of Skybox Security, a provider of automated security risk management solutions. Prior to Skybox Security, Mr. Arev held several R&D management positions at Check Point Software and at Comverse Network Systems. Mr. Arev holds a Master of Science in Electrical Engineering from Tel-Aviv University and a Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering from the Technion, Israel Institute of Technology, both cum laude.
